subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: for those that are signaly challenged
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
You don't have to get these on eBay and there are several models.

http://www.selectatenna.com/

Myself, I would probably just build one!
:-)

Zack

On Fri, 11 Jan 2008, Frank Sumption wrote:

> There's afew things you can build very cheap to improve AM reception,
> look up AM loops on the web for simple, and cheap antennas.
>
> Frank-S
>
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ron Lederer <ronriko@...> wrote:
>>
>> Wow, what a testimony in deed.  When I get to the U.S. I will buy
> one.   Ron L
